item.title: # collection no.2
item.description: - you are a mirror, when i look into you and stare at your soul. i know and learn to love myself… – it’s all scatter everywhere, a mess and all of this are nothing but scatter pieces no beginning nor ending even a puzzle have collected pieces a place for each piece, meant to be in that place – if one person doens’t have those thoughts anymore, would them still be the same person?

item.title: # the hill
item.description: - It all began on top of the hill, excited and fun, and slowly slided down until they reached the ‘valley of despair’ where all they can see is nothing but fog, mist, dark, and not everyone can get out of it, hence the name. But those who keep rolling despite the heavy baggage, the string, pulling them back, those who have strength, courage will see the end of it, that is, a glimpse of hope in the form of a light beam shining down on their path.

item.title: # sleeping act
item.description: - He was laying, turning his body around and around to find a comfortable position to sleep. Yesterday he slept like a snail, curled everything up, the day before, a vampire, with both his arms and legs straight out, and the day before that, a butterfly, tomorrow maybe a giraffe, standing. Every time he found it, he only had one wish. He wishes to have a bullet fired through his head to make them stop running or a sword pierced through his heart to make it stop feeling.

item.title: # suddenly
item.description: - Childhood isn’t in some of those photographs, isn’t in those places you used to visit. It is when a familiar aroma suddenly hits your nose that makes you remember your mother’s breakfast, a familiar scent of the newly built house that makes you remember going out with your father to buy cement for your new home. A sudden scene of those kids playing with dirt makes you remember when you sneaked out to catch crickets with your friends at night.

item.title: # two windows
item.description: - time like this, usually they have two windows, one to see out side and another to the world. and those who that don’t have the latter, they carry themselves with a vivid imagination. with only a tree, they can tell others stories, and with only one beam of light, they can see the sun. they must be the strongest of all to make it through this time of life, but will those imagination ever stop running, and creating such lively images.

item.title: # another attempt
item.description: - When there is no solution yet to be found, escapism will become king, a cruel one. But one will not see the king at first hand, his loyal servant - ‘denial’ will stand at the gate, perhaps, ready for a fight if one persists in meeting a king. All that to the question: what will the king do? If one has the strength and courage to defeat such “a being”, a hidden door behind his throne will lead one to freedom, liberation, and clarity as well as stillness in one’s mind - become the hero in the midst of ordinary with power to create the extraordinary.

item.title: # the dance
item.description: - one time we had a dance maybe you think that was nothing and maybe that was by chance but i remember it despite my bad memory every footstep, backward and forward in every note of that song but i guess i was late alone, i have to solve this crossword this is no Careless whisper but the tune sings loudly in my head maybe in the bleak midwinter i’ll play the song again on my old cassette

item.title: # wears off
item.description: - Suppose you came back from where that took something from you or everything. The one who came back was not the one who walked in and what after that is just some extra time that they gave to you. Some may take that time and do something crazy or stupid, some may take it to create the extraordinary or close to the extraordinary. Either way, it isn’t bad if you look at it, they all prepare to immerse themselves in the nothingness, that is, death.

item.title: # different
item.description: - I am a picture but try telling a story You are a story but try painting an album We are living in the same world But seem to be from two different one Is it funny, isn’t it? Just like small lizard in the rain oh how did he get there with the house he’s been crawling on cannot seem to find a home with all the food he’s been stepping on

item.title: # mirror
item.description: - a child stops smiling a woman goes silence a man never came back the wind, raging, yelling the cloud, pouring down the soil the moon, turned dark teardrops, swallowed the sun the bird, now swimming fingers, turned into matches water, turned into oxygen and ignited its very own soul but there’s still another side of the mirror and the sky is pretty much blue over here… “mọi chuyện dường như quá đỗi bình thường”

item.title: # i don't know
item.description: - there are a lot of words to be said but none shall hear for all she ever did was write them down in that paper sheet and burn it afterwards. those ashes…flying, flowing mid-air, circling around her as if they are singing to her ears, and saying those words back to her, telling her own stories. that is a ritual she loves to do when her voice cracks, her throat thickens, and when she is all by herself, and when she types the last word of each page.

item.title: # anew
# collection no.1
# story and picture
item.description: - telling a story is like painting a picture. starting with a simple point, then a line, sometimes a curve, adding colour, favorite colour, good one, bad one just to make it diverse. some may call it good, some may add a few details, and some may even tear the whole canvas apart. but it doesn’t matter because paint can be drawn again, all the line, the curve, the detail are already there, and the original exists nowhere else but within the painter.

item.title: # a heart-less
item.description: - A man was taking a stroll after dinner as usual then saw a small bar with an interesting name and decided to go in. The bar seems amusing but strangely no one there but the owner. He sat down at the counter. After a few drinks, he told the bartender “You know what would be funny? It’s able to take your heart out, hold it in your hand and see it beating slowly, but the mind thinks it already died a long time ago.

item.title: # shadow people
item.description: - all are but shadows, can only be seen at days, return home and emrged at night. conceal behind one’s back, a place only for the second, and let out a cry when light outs. they are always there even if the flames are not… so don’t be afraid. “mọi chuyện dường như quá đỗi bình thường” -R

item.title: # away it goes
item.description: - There it goes, away it goes The day goes by and something talking with nothing Maybe expecting plays out too much Maybe hope is persevering A little jazz playing there A little blue in this bottle A little fish swimming slowly The old train forgot direction to the castle Angel wings are dropping, so seemingly ‘Chet Baker - Almost blue’ Wind sticks to the wall like glue ‘In the mood for love - Shigeru Umebayashi’

item.title: # on a bridge
# supine
item.description: - Everyday is the same, he follows a structure, a pattern which he knows perfectly well, as if he pushes a stone up a mountain just to see the stone rolls down and tomorrow will be the same, rarely a peak of joyfulness but that surely keeps his soul intact. He seems to have things which anyone will find contentment ? “mọi chuyện dường như quá đỗi bình thường”

item.title: # untitled no.2

item.title: # beauty and sadness
item.description: - the term “just for fun” implied the existence of “just for sad” Suppose one day, you go to the mountain just to sit down, watch the sky, and observe. Spot a lonely tree has its root deep into the soil of an isolated hill - feel the sadness just for the sake of it. Spot a solo flying bird and a single beam of sunlight shining over it as if it was guidance to the nest - feel the sadness just for the sake of it.

item.title: # arise
item.description: - I don’t see you anymore The walls start talking again “it’s alright, let them come” I don’t hear your voice anymore The night is still quiet again “it’s alright, let it be” Oh you, young boy Where are you, why do you have to sink that low? The boy who keep saying “it’s alright” to me Nothing but silence now Guess I have to say it to myself And the old dance routine at midnight

item.title: # video game
item.description: - Life is brilliant. Beautiful. It enchants us, to the point of obsession. Some are true to their purpose, though they are but shells, flesh and mind. One man lost his own body, but lingered on, as a head. Others chase the charms of love, however elusive. Peace grants men the illusion of life. Shackled by falsehoods, they yearn for love, unaware of its grand illusion. Until, the curse touches their flesh.

item.title: # mediocre-ish
item.description: - Watching some extraordinary film to feel less ordinary, when that two hours of goodness ended, the train takes you back to your homeland. Everything you do is too normal to the point that makes you hate it, but that’s not the end, living with the thing you hate turned out that you slowly love them. And from that moment on, you don’t have to revolt against it anymore, it has become your greatest ally that no person in the world could match its strengths or even weaknesses.

item.title: # wandering soul

item.title: # to drink
item.description: - to drink is to forget something to remember something to make something happen to wish of undone something to feel what word failed to say and to see what action failed to do drink once to this drink twice to that drink finite to the infinite “mọi chuyện dường như quá đỗi bình thường” -R

item.title: # the rare
item.description: - The rare is indeed for the rare But is it wrong to change one’s surroundings? one always have the power to do as such It could be the way one’s trust is different and the way one choose to filter out the rare One might encounter some might be glad to water the soil, or even poison the air, but that’s the risk one is willing to take, isn’t it so?

item.title: # do this
item.description: - If you wanna swim in the ocean of laughter, do this but be careful for the regretting shark If you wanna unlock the hidden memories, do this but be careful ‘cause there’s no guidance If you wanna see how much you’ve grown, do this but be careful for your own ignorance If you wanna feel something other than nothing, do this but be careful for the rabbit, do not chase the rabbit

item.title: # beautiful
item.description: - what makes something bearutiful? is it the existence of the opposite - ugly? but then what makes the thing ugly or unpleasant? or is it always a beauty that exists in the observer’s eyes? never seen the face never seen the smile just a glimpse not eyes but only one enough to say “Ah, beauty…” eh? “mọi chuyện dường như quá đỗi bình thường” -R

item.title: # illusion of freedom
item.description: - Longing for freedom the one that allows us to fully express ourselves, to the endless sky, soaring with the wind, absorbing the warm sunlight, to emerge oneself with the earth, liberation like a kite, flying with all of its wills But it is all but an illusion for a kite has a string A string help it fly, and at some point, will pull it back, put in a closet

Last night was a pirate, drowned, the day before was a cheerful old grandma, died of old age…

item.title: # bad Game
item.description: - Link the fire to extend the age of Light or let it fade to introduce the age of men, dark. But in the age of dark, embers will dance, and once again, fire will be rekindled. But whether to do or not to do, a loop is always created. A circle that has no end nor beginning, a mere absurdity will bring every action to a halt. There is no right answer nor there is wrong, it just is.

item.title: # an answer ?
item.description: - Going left is only right in some cases and going right is only right in some cases. Whether to choose to go left or right solely depends on the occasion and circumstances. What if one chooses to stay in the middle and wait for the situation to act, to choose which path, left or right? But choosing to stay is also choosing to go either left or right, in a bigger picture, thus creating infinite paths, infinite choices in one’s mind.

item.title: # the secret setrayal
item.description: - ‘Only in truth, the lords will abandon their thrones’ Souls of lords he’s gathered, five lords sit on their five thrones, now the final battle has approached. But he has something that was meant to be hidden, far away from the world, lurking itself in the frightful image of the abandoned realm. The eyes of a Fire Keeper… ‘… but Fire Keepers are not meant to have eyes. It is forbidden.

item.title: # the barmaid and the ashen one
item.description: - barmaid: “Last day, huh?” ashen one: “I guess so” barmaid: “Have something to say, don’t you?” ashen one: “ *sigh * I think I dug myself a hole so deep that now I am lost under the ground, too far down from the surface, worse than that, I’ve been there for too long and the comfort is growing within myself. I no longer long for a way out but at the same time I can sense a tiny fracture of myself screaming, stretching to the sky but all of that, all the effort were in vain and so close to the edge of hopelessness.

item.title: # untitled
item.description: - A million voices scream every day, a million voices want to be heard, a million stories want to be told but not a single ear wants to listen, then those screams turned into silence, those stories were forced to cut their own words. Thus, creates a void of stillness like a lake in the bleak winter, with only eyes left to look at one after another, time itself froze at the bottomless lake.

item.title: # in middle
item.description: - Tôi tin rằng có một kiểu người như thế này, kiểu người “ở giữa”, kiểu người tồn tại giữa hai thế giới, không hẳn đã chết nhưng cũng chưa thực sự sống. Thích đèn vàng thay cho đỏ hay xanh, chưa thực sự cười và cũng chưa rơi quá một giọt lệ, có thể thỏa mình trên chuyến đi nhưng lại ghét bắt đầu hay kết thúc nó. Chỉ có thể tìm đến y trong lúc bạn lưỡng lự nên nhớ hay quên, trong lúc mặt trời sắp lặn, trong lúc nụ cười dần tắt, trong câu trả lời là “Bình thường” cho câu hỏi “Đang vui hay buồn?

item.title: # peace of mind
item.description: - He can only find it in between of things, between the honking sound of one car and another, between the ticking second of a traffic light when he looked at it, between the finished task to another beginning, between each sip of coffee and finally between the consolatory silence. He is in war with no one other than himself, he wants something which cannot exist, his war but in peace.

item.title: # enough to fill a man's heart
item.description: - A young man who always feels he doesn’t belong, every where he went, he felt a sense of disconnect, disconnect with his surrounding, his people, sometimes his mind as if he hungry for a place of his own, his own trees howling in the wind, his own moon’s reflection on a quiet lake, his own sun circling around him..his own people. Everyday he counts his steps while walking to the four walls of contentment, missed one step he thought but it’s matter not as he unlocking the door.

item.title: # knowing
item.description: - All this time in my head there was a question, one question can turn everything seems joyful into gloomy, cleverness into sadness and happiness into despair. I long for an answer, a direction, or simply a guideline to set out… as you may guess, I found it, found the answer, THE answer that is, my effort, my attempt, my endeavor was less than the meaningless and the nothingness itself.

item.title: # story of a man

Nhưng dù sao thì mọi chuyện đã qua, giờ chỉ còn là những kí ức khó quên.

item.title: # fun Souls

Encountered countless decaying skeletons, senseless undeads, horrendous monsters, even dragons. Fought them all.

item.description: - Sẽ có những lúc mà đứng cũng thấy mỏi, ngồi cũng chẳng yên, nằm cũng thấy muộn phiền, mỗi cơ bắp thớ thịt trong người cũng như đang biểu tình chống đối không cho làm một hành động nào cả. item.title: # người quen cũ

Nhận ra điều đó khiến gã buồn, chán nản và thất vọng nhưng gã đã cải thiện được điều đó. Gã nói tôi rằng cái phiên bản đó của gã không còn nữa nhưng đôi lúc gã vẫn cảm nhận được nó ở đâu đó trong tâm gã.

item.description: - mỗi ng như một cơn sóng, tần số dao động, một giai điệu khác nhau và độc nhất hoà quyện cùng những người khác, phù hợp, giao hưởng, hoà âm tạo thành một bài ca tuyệt vời, đằm thắm, sâu sắc thế nhưng có những người bản thân họ cũng đã là một bản hoà âm, chỉ có thể ngân nga khi đứng một mình, họ biết điều đó, chấp nhận nó nên rồi cũng không còn quan trọng việc được hoà quyện

item.title: # quán cf
item.description: - Tôi ưa chuộng những nơi như thế này, ko quá cầu kì lại cực kì đơn giản, dù không mở nhạc như nơi khác mà lại đủ âm thanh, thứ tiếng, tiếng của mọi loại xe qua lại, tiếng người rôm rả chia sẻ về cuộc đời họ, tiếng kêu leng keng của chìa khoá treo trước bụng của mấy doanh nhân, tiếng chân chạy ình ịch của những gã đang cố giảm cân và tiếng phì phèo điếu thuốc của cụ già với cái nhìn xa xăm… Âm thanh của cuộc sống.

item.title: # Force Positivity
item.description: - I struggle with happiness.. I think we all do.. and I don’t think a lot of people talk about it because… There’s no in between! I think it’s either you’re happy or you’re depressed! But what if you’re just fine? There’s times where I feel really happy but at that time I also know this is temporary and I’m gonna go back to just fine. And there’s times where I feel unhappy and I know it’s gonna go back to normal.

item.title: # Captain of a ship
item.description: - “Cái anh thiếu là đồng minh…” Có người nói tôi như thế, khen tôi có nhiều ý tưởng, hay ho, tuy không quá mới nhưng đáng để thực hiện nhưng lại chê tôi quá cô độc và khuyên nhủ rằng thế giới này muốn tiến xa hơn thì phải có bạn đồng hành. Tôi thấy một phần nào đó nó lung lay được mình vì hồi đó giờ trên con thuyền này chỉ có tôi làm thuyền trưởng, điều hành mọi thứ nên vì vậy nó đi khá chậm so với mặt bằng chung.

item.title: # Sputnik thoughts
